entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
